title: MSC Cruises flash sale has luxury European cruises from £319pp but be quick
text:

Always wanted to go on a luxury cruise, but sticking to a holiday budget? Then you may want to check out Mirror Cruise's latest sale.

That's because the cruise deals website has launched a huge flash sale on MSC Cruises, and that includes luxury European sailings from £319pp.

Oh, and some packages come with extra perks such as return flights and free handpicked hotel stays at some of the destinations.

The best part is that there are travel dates for both 2019 and 2020, so it's ideal whether you're after a last-minute getaway or you've been thinking of planning ahead for next year's getaways.

You can already book the Mirror Cruise flash sale deals here but you'll need to do so by Monday 7th October when the sale ends.

There's a wide array of deals on offer so to help you narrow it down, we've picked out some of our favourite discounted packages so far...

(Prices are based on two people sharing an Inside Cabin but there are options to upgrade to outside or balcony cabins and suites for an extra fee).

This five-night holiday includes a three-night stay at Hamburg, followed by a mini cruise on board MSC Grandiosa from Hamburg to Southampton. Ideal for those who've never been on a cruise holiday before and just want to get a feel for what it's all about!

Departs the 28th February 2020. Find out more and book here.

This nine-night holiday includes two nights in Rome and a seven-night cruise on board MSC Grandiosa. Ports of call include Civitavecchia, Palermo, Valletta, Barcelona, Marseille and Genoa.

Departs the 24th January 2020, return flights from various UK airports included. Find out more and book here.

This 13-night holiday includes two nights in Rome, followed by an 11-night cruise to hotspots in the Mediterranean and Canary Islands on board MSC Opera. Ports of call include Civitavecchia, Genoa, Malaga, Funcha, lSanta Cruz de Tenerife, Tangier and Cartegena.

Departs the 23rd January 2020, return flights from various UK airports included. Find out more and book here.

The eight-night holiday includes one night in Miami followed by a seven-night sailing across the Eastern Caribbean on board MSC Armonia. Ports of call include Miami, Montego Bay, Georgetown (Grand Cayman), Costa Maya and the cruise line's new private island Ocean Cay MSC Marine Reserve.

Departs the 8th March 2020, return flights from various UK airports included. Find out more and book here.

This eight-night trip includes one night in Genoa and a seven-night sailing across the Mediterranean on board MSC Grandiosa. Ports of call include Genoa, Civitavecchia, Palermo, Valletta, Barcelona and Marseille.

Departs the 20th March 2020, return flights from various UK airports included. Find out more and book here.



All prices correct at the time of writing, and are subject to change and availability.
description: Mirror Cruise has launched a flash sale on MSC Cruises and there are some temptingly cheap sailings up for grabs
